data.name: Error_ParsingCrashWorker
data.value: ERROR: Unable to parse worker id of worker to crash. Value is '{0}'. Ensure the value is a number between 0 and {1}.

data.name: Error_ParsingNumberOfWorkers
data.value: ERROR: Unable to parse number of workers: '{0}'. Ensure the value is a number between 0 and 100.

data.name: Error_ParsingStartPort
data.value: ERROR: Unable to parse start port '{0}'. Ensure the value is a number between 1 and 65535.

data.name: Error_TimedOutWaitingForExit
data.value: ERROR: Timed out waiting for process to exit.

data.name: Error_UnexpectedArgumentCount
data.value: ERROR: Invalid number of arguments. See the help text.

data.name: HelpText
data.value:
Tests a simulated distributed {ShortProductName} build.
Command line: DistributedBuildRunner.exe [number of workers] [crash a worker]
Command line arguments: number of workers: the number of workers (in addition to master) to use for the build. crash a worker: (true or false). If true, kill one of the workers during the run.
Environment variables: BUILDXL_EXE_PATH: Path to {ShortProductName} process
All environment variables below have the token {machineNumber} replaced with appropriate value. BUILDXL_COMMON_ARGS: Arguments passed to master and workers BUILDXL_MASTER_ARGS: Arguments passed to master process BUILDXL_WORKER_ARGS: Arguments passed to worker process
